typeName: all blocks created by Alfaware Tutorials
spec: Swipe Layout          (All blocks created by Alfaware Tutorials)

name: Horizontal Swipe
spec: Swipe forelayout ( %m.view ) and backlayout ( %m.view ) with animation duration ( %d )

name: VSwipe
spec: Vertical Swipe forelayout ( %m.view ) and backlayout ( %m.view ) and animation duration ( %d )

name: Widgt
spec: add widget ( %m.view ) for your finger and add message onClick ( %s  )
Swipe linear     (you need to watch a video from Alfaware Tutorials)

code: %1$s.setOnTouchListener(new View.OnTouchListener() {@Override public boolean onTouch(View p1, MotionEvent p2){ switch(p2.getAction()) { case MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN: alfa = p2.getX();break; case MotionEvent.ACTION_UP: ware = p2.getX();if (((alfa - ware) < -250)) {_slideLeft();} if (((ware - alfa) < -250)) {_slideRight();}break;}return true;}});
name: linear
video_url
spec: Set TextView ( %m.textview  ) to Alfaware Tutorials video URL
